function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zoonotic disease emergence and interspecific disease transmission","Impact":"Potential for new diseases to emerge and spread from wildlife to urban areas, leading to widespread infections","Mitigation":"Improve food systems planning and reduce wildlife urban interfaces (WUIs)","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GIS mapping, urban planning tools","People":"Urban populations, especially those in close proximity to wildlife and urban interfaces","Owner":"Urban planners, government agencies, wildlife conservation organizations"}]}
